org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel

Interface TokenProcessingEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NamedWorkflowEntity, WorkflowItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Dataflow, Merge, Processor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataflowImpl, ProcessorImpl

    public interface TokenProcessingEntity
extends NamedWorkflowEntity
    Superinterface for all classes within the workflow model which consume and emit workflow data tokens.

    • Method Summary

      Run a collection level based type check on the token processing entity

      • doTypeCheck

        boolean doTypeCheck()
             throws IterationTypeMismatchException,
                    InvalidDataflowException
        Run a collection level based type check on the token processing entity
        Returns:
        true if the typecheck was successful or false if the check failed because there were preconditions missing such as unsatisfied input types
        Throws:
        IterationTypeMismatchException - if the typing occurred but didn't match because of an iteration mismatch
        InvalidDataflowException - if the entity depended on a dataflow that was not valid
